org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils

Class JDOSupport<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JDOSupport<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventDAO, LocalWorkerState, RunDatabaseDAO, UsageRecordRecorder, UserStore

    public abstract class JDOSupport<T>
extends Object
    Simple support class that wraps up and provides access to the correct parts of JDO.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JDOSupport.PersistenceManagerBuilder
      Manages persistence managers in a way that doesn't cause problems when the web application is unloaded.
      static class  JDOSupport.TransactionAspect
      Manages integration of JDO transactions with Spring.
      static interface  JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
      Mark a method (of a subclass of JDOSupport) as having a transaction wrapped around it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected JDOSupport(Class<T> contextClass)
      Instantiate this class, supplying it a handle to the class that will be used to provide context for queries and accesses.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Delete a persistence-coupled instance of the context class.

      Look up an instance of the context class by its identity.

      • isPersistent

        protected boolean isPersistent()
        Has this class actually been configured with a persistence manager by Spring?
        Returns:
        Whether there is a persistence manager installed.

      • query

        @Nonnull
protected javax.jdo.Query<T> query(@Nonnull
                                            String filter)
        Get an instance of a query in JDOQL.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter part of the query.
        Returns:
        The query, which should be executed to retrieve the results.

      • namedQuery

        @Nonnull
protected javax.jdo.Query namedQuery(@Nonnull
                                              String name)
        Get an instance of a named query attached to the context class (as an annotation). Note that the result is a raw Query because not all queries return instances of the context class.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the query.
        Returns:
        The query, which should be executed to retrieve the results.
        See Also:
        Query

      • persist

        @Nullable
protected T persist(@Nullable
                              T value)
        Make an instance of the context class persist in the database. It's identity must not already exist.
        Parameters:
        value - The instance to persist.
        Returns:
        The persistence-coupled instance.

      • detach

        @Nullable
protected T detach(@Nullable
                             T value)
        Make a non-persistent (i.e., will hold its value past the end of the transaction) copy of a persistence-coupled instance of the context class.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to decouple.
        Returns:
        The non-persistent copy.

      • getById

        @Nullable
protected T getById(Object id)
        Look up an instance of the context class by its identity.
        Parameters:
        id - The identity of the object.
        Returns:
        The instance, which is persistence-coupled.
